title: Rule 8

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -At night, create an ability. It will get added to your abilities at the end of the night, if the host accepts. If the host refuses, you may keep using this ability until the host accepts.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -While you are in the game, all players gain "may Multitask". Includes you.

desc:
